TEXT.S: Corey Brewer nalecuhan i Portland, Tennessee, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Corey Brewer i 2007 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 7, namapili' tu nu Minnesota Timberwolves putiput. 3 bulad 5 demiad, 1986 a mihca, Corey Brewer, miunduay.
